SubmitterDescription.SubmitterName: International Standards For Cytogenomic Arrays Consortium (ISCA)

SampleDescription.Description: mosaic, ring chromosome was present in 12 out of 20 metaphases, in approximately 66% of interphase nuclei from a PHA-stimulated culture, and in 56.5% of interphase nuclei from a direct preparation. Phenotype: developmental disorders

Name.ElementValue: Developmental delay AND/OR other significant developmental or morphological phenotypes
